get.summary: Gets an instance of the resource.

patch.summary: Updates an existing instance of the resource.

crossMetricsOperator.description: cross metrics operator should be specified when setting up multiple metric alerting configurations

schema.description: The template for adding optional properties.

schema.description: The template for adding optional properties.

delete.summary: Deletes an existing instance of the resource.

post.summary: Creates a new instance of the resource.

get.summary: Lists all instances of the resource.
Gets an instance of the resource.

patch.summary: Updates an existing instance of the resource.

granularityAmount.description: if granularity is custom,it is required.

timestampColumn.description: user-defined timestamp column. if timestampColumn is null, start time of every time slice will be used as default value.

startOffsetInSeconds.description: the time that the beginning of data ingestion task will delay for every data slice according to this offset.

maxConcurrency.description: the max concurrency of data ingestion queries against user data source. 0 means no limitation.

minRetryIntervalInSeconds.description: the min retry interval for failed data ingestion tasks.

stopRetryAfterInSeconds.description: stop retry data ingestion after the data slice first schedule time in seconds.

needRollup.description: mark if the data feed need rollup

allUpIdentification.description: the identification value for the row of calculated all-up value.

fillMissingPointType.description: the type of fill missing point for anomaly detection

fillMissingPointValue.description: the value of fill missing point for anomaly detection

viewMode.description: data feed access mode, default is Private

isAdmin.description: the query user is one of data feed administrator or not

authenticationType.description: authentication type for corresponding data source

SkipParameter.name: skip
SkipParameter.description: An offset into the collection of the first resource to be returned

MaxPageSizeParameter.name: mazpagesize
MaxPageSizeParameter.description: The maximum number of resources to include in a single response

allSeriesCount.description: All series count under non deleted data feed

metricsCount.description: The metrics count under non deleted data feed

dataFeedCount.description: The count of non deleted data feed

crossMetricsOperator.description: cross metrics operator should be specified when setting up multiple metric alerting configurations

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

granularityAmount.description: if granularity is custom,it is required.

timestampColumn.description: user-defined timestamp column. if timestampColumn is null, start time of every time slice will be used as default value.

startOffsetInSeconds.description: the time that the beginning of data ingestion task will delay for every data slice according to this offset.

maxConcurrency.description: the max concurrency of data ingestion queries against user data source. 0 means no limitation.

minRetryIntervalInSeconds.description: the min retry interval for failed data ingestion tasks.

stopRetryAfterInSeconds.description: stop retry data ingestion after the data slice first schedule time in seconds.

needRollup.description: mark if the data feed need rollup

allUpIdentification.description: the identification value for the row of calculated all-up value.

fillMissingPointType.description: the type of fill missing point for anomaly detection

fillMissingPointValue.description: the value of fill missing point for anomaly detection

viewMode.description: data feed access mode, default is Private

isAdmin.description: the query user is one of data feed administrator or not

authenticationType.description: authentication type for corresponding data source

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

startTime.description: the start point of time range to query data ingestion status.

endTime.description: the end point of time range to query data ingestion status.

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

latestSuccessTimestamp.description:
the timestamp of latest success ingestion job.
null indicates not available

latestActiveTimestamp.description:
the timestamp of latest ingestion job with status update.
null indicates not available

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items
The link to the next page of items
The link to the next page of items

startTime.description: This is inclusive. The maximum number of data points (series number * time range) is 10000.

endTime.description: This is exclusive. The maximum number of data points (series number * time range) is 10000.

series.description: The series to be queried. The identity must be able to define one single time series instead of a group of time series. The maximum number of series is 100.

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items
The link to the next page of items
The link to the next page of items
The link to the next page of items

startTime.description: start time of query a time series data, and format should be yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ssZ. The maximum number of data points (series number * time range) is 10000.

endTime.description: start time of query a time series data, and format should be yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ssZ. The maximum number of data points (series number * time range) is 10000.

series.description: query specific series. The maximum number of series is 100.

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

activeSince.description: query series ingested after this time, the format should be yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ

dimensionFilter.description: filter specific dimension name and values

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

startTime.description: the start point of time range to query anomaly detection status.

endTime.description: the end point of time range to query anomaly detection status.

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes

message.description: A human-readable representation of the error

period.description: point count used to look back, value range : [1, +)

minTopCount.description:
min count should be in top N, value range : [1, +)

should be less than or equal to period

lower.description:
lower bound

should be specified when direction is Both or Down

upper.description:
upper bound

should be specified when direction is Both or Up

valueType.description: data used to implement value filter

metricId.description: the other metric unique id used for value filter

triggerForMissing.description:
trigger alert when the corresponding point is missing in the other metric

should be specified only when using other metric to filter

status.description: latest ingestion task status for this data slice.

message.description: the trimmed message of last ingestion job.

isAnomalyList.description: whether points of the series are anomalies

periodList.description: period calculated on each point of the series

expectedValueList.description: expected values of the series given by smart detector

lowerBoundaryList.description: lower boundary list of the series given by smart detector

upperBoundaryList.description: upper boundary list of the series given by smart detector

dataFeedId.description: data feed unique id only return for alerting anomaly result

metricId.description: metric unique id only return for alerting anomaly result

anomalyDetectionConfigurationId.description: anomaly detection configuration unique id only return for alerting anomaly result

createdTime.description: created time only return for alerting result

modifiedTime.description: modified time only return for alerting result

dataFeedId.description: data feed unique id only return for alerting anomaly result

metricId.description: metric unique id only return for alerting incident result

anomalyDetectionConfigurationId.description: anomaly detection configuration unique id only return for alerting incident result

timestampList.description: timestamps of the data related to this time series

valueList.description: values of the data related to this time series

IngestionStatusType.description: latest ingestion task status for this data slice.

anomalyStatus.description: anomaly status only return for alerting anomaly result

expectedValue.description: expected value of the anomaly given by smart detector

maxSeverity.description: max severity of latest anomalies in the incident

incidentStatus.description: incident status only return for alerting incident result

expectedValueOfRootNode.description: expected value of the root node given by smart detector
